title: Is there a place where I can watch my favorite brazil team Keyd Stars play in the final in BR?
body: Im hoping to be able to at least see the final, I don't really care about who is shoutcasting, but I'd love to see the Keyd Stars play. Any help?

replies.body: Keyd Stars will play the finals against INTZ on April 18 at 12pm BRT/8am PDT in a Best of 5 series. You can watch the stream and all the CBLoL broadcasts here: http://br.leagueoflegends.com/pt/cblol/
Thanks PwnLove!!! I love me some best of 5's.
